Name: Reconstructing Faces from fMRI Patterns using Deep Generative Neural Networks.
ReferencesAndLinks: VanRullen, R., & Reddy, L. (2018). Reconstructing Faces from fMRI Patterns using Deep Generative Neural Networks. arXiv preprint arXiv:1810.03856.
HowToAcknowledge: Please cite the paper and mention that the dataset was downloaded from the OpenNeuro database.
Acknowledgements: The authors would like to thank Dr. Isabelle Berry for subject screening, B.Cottereau for assistance with ethics approval, and the staff of the ImagingCenter, INSERM-UPS UMR825 MRI Platform.
